info.author: Guy Rutenberg
classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: GNU General Public License (GPL)
info.description:
Package of scripts that manipulate css files. Currently it holds two scripts,
the first one is able to remove comments and unnecessary whitespace form css
files and by doing so reduce the filesize, it can also restore the file to a
readable state. The second script can translate css based web-design to RTL.
info.name: css-scripts
info.summary: Package of scripts that manipulate css files
info.html_description: Package of scripts that manipulate css files. Currently it holds two scripts, the first one is able to remove comments and unnecessary whitespace form css files and by doing so reduce the filesize, it can also restore the file to a readable state. The second script can translate css based web-design to RTL.
